name: Mathura-Vrindavan Tour
description: Experience the divine cities of Mathura and Vrindavan in this one-day tour. Visit Krishna Janmasthan, Banke Bihari Temple, ISKCON Temple, and more. Perfect for pilgrims and tourists alike.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: 8:00 AM - Visit Krishna Janmasthan Temple Complex
12:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)

name: Agra Day Trip
description: Visit the iconic Taj Mahal and other historical monuments in Agra. This full-day tour takes you through the rich Mughal heritage and architectural marvels of the city.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: 7:30 AM - Arrive at Taj Mahal for sunrise view
12:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
2:00 PM - Mehtab Bagh (for perfect Taj Mahal views)

name: Spiritual Braj Tour
description: Explore the sacred Braj region including Mathura, Vrindavan, Gokul, Barsana, and Nandgaon. Experience the spiritual essence of Lord Krishna's birthplace and childhood playgrounds.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: 1:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
7:00 PM - Check-in at hotel & overnight stay
10:00 AM - Visit Banke Bihari & ISKCON Temples
1:00 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)

name: Delhi-Mathura-Agra Golden Triangle
description: Experience the best of North India with this Golden Triangle tour. Visit the national capital Delhi, the spiritual city of Mathura, and the historical city of Agra with the iconic Taj Mahal.
includes: Pick-up from Delhi and drop to your preferred location
itinerary: 1:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
3:00 PM - India Gate & Rashtrapati Bhavan drive
7:00 PM - Check-in at hotel & overnight stay
1:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
7:00 PM - Check-in at hotel in Mathura & overnight stay
1:00 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
7:00 PM - Return to Delhi/Mathura as per your preference

name: Mathura Festival Special Tour
description: Experience the vibrant festivals of Mathura like Holi, Janmashtami, or Diwali. This special tour is customized based on festival dates and includes cultural experiences and traditional celebrations.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: Festival-specific itinerary will be provided upon booking
5:00 PM - Visit to Banke Bihari Temple for Phoolon Wali Holi
8:00 AM - Experience Holi celebrations in Mathura & Vrindavan
1:00 PM - Lunch with traditional Holi specialties

name: Mathura-Vrindavan-Gokul-Agra Tour
description: Experience the best of spiritual and historical India with this comprehensive 2-day tour covering Lord Krishna's birthplace and childhood sites along with the majestic Taj Mahal and Agra Fort.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: 11:30 AM - Visit Nand Bhavan & other temples in Gokul
1:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
8:30 PM - Check-in at hotel in Agra & overnight stay
6:00 AM - Early morning visit to Taj Mahal (sunrise view)
12:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
2:00 PM - Mehtab Bagh (for perfect Taj Mahal views)

name: Mathura-Fatehpur Sikri-Taj Mahal Tour
description: Discover the perfect blend of spirituality and Mughal grandeur with this 2-day tour package covering Krishna's birthplace and the magnificent architectural wonders of Fatehpur Sikri and Taj Mahal.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: 12:00 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
3:00 PM - Explore Fatehpur Sikri (UNESCO World Heritage Site)
7:30 PM - Check-in at hotel in Agra & overnight stay
6:00 AM - Sunrise visit to Taj Mahal
12:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
4:00 PM - Shopping at Agra's marble handicraft stores

name: Delhi-Mathura-Agra Golden Triangle
description: Experience the perfect North India tour with this 3-day package covering the capital city Delhi, the spiritual city of Mathura, and the historical city of Agra. Ideal for international tourists and those short on time.
includes: Airport/railway station pick-up and drop in Delhi
itinerary: 9:00 AM - Pick-up from Delhi hotel/airport/railway station
10:00 AM - Visit Qutub Minar (UNESCO World Heritage Site)
1:00 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
2:30 PM - India Gate & Presidential Palace drive-past
6:00 PM - Chandni Chowk rickshaw ride experience
7:30 PM - Dinner and overnight stay in Delhi
12:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
8:30 PM - Check-in at hotel in Agra & overnight stay
Day 3: Agra Sightseeing & Return to Delhi
6:00 AM - Sunrise visit to Taj Mahal
12:30 PM - Lunch break (not included in package)
6:00 PM - Drop-off at Delhi hotel/airport/railway station

name: Spiritual Mathura Circuit
description: Immerse yourself in the spiritual atmosphere of the Braj region with this comprehensive 1-day tour of lesser-known but highly significant temples and ghats around Mathura, perfect for devotees seeking a deeper connection.
includes: Pick-up and drop from your hotel in Mathura
itinerary: 7:00 AM - Morning aarti at Vishram Ghat
4:30 PM - Madan Mohan Temple & Kesi Ghat
7:00 PM - Evening Yamuna aarti at Vishram Ghat
